# Table 1 - Baseline characteristics

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tbl_func(df_char, strat_var = "VRI",
          c("Age","Gender","Diagnosis",
            "Kraniotomi","Kraniektomi","Endovascular","EVD.Bilateral","EVD.replacement","Reoperation",
            "EVD.duration","Time.to.Treatment","Treatment.duration","VRI.Gentamicin","VRI.Vancomycin","VRI.Other","Shunt","Mortality"))

```

# Table 2 - CSV characteristics

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tbl_func(df_samples, strat_var = "sample_group",
          c("CSV.WBC","CSV.RBC","CSV.Glucose","CSV.Lactate","Blood.CRP","CSV.WBC.RBC.ratio",
            "Blood.PCT"))

```

# Table 3 - Rule out VRI

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
   df <- df_samples[df_samples$sample_group == "Negative" | df_samples$sample_group == "Positive",]

   FitFlextableToPage(flextable(data.frame(rbind(
   pred_table(df,var="WBC/RBC ratio","df$sample_group == 'Positive'","df$CSV.WBC.RBC.ratio > 0.037",cols = c("sample_group","CSV.WBC.RBC.ratio")),
   pred_table(df,var="CSF/plasma glucose ratio","df$sample_group == 'Positive'","df$CSV.P.Glu.ratio < 0.6",cols = c("sample_group","CSV.P.Glu.ratio")),
   pred_table(df,var="CSF protein","df$sample_group == 'Positive'","df$CSV.Protein > 0.5",cols = c("sample_group","CSV.Protein")),
   pred_table(df,var="High WBC/RBC ratio and high CSF protein and low glucose ratio","df$sample_group == 'Positive'","df$CSV.WBC.RBC.ratio > 0.037 & df$CSV.P.Glu.ratio < 0.6 & df$CSV.Protein > 0.5",cols = c("sample_group","CSV.WBC.RBC.ratio","CSV.P.Glu.ratio","CSV.Protein")),
   pred_table(df,var="Low WBC/RBC ratio and low CSF protein  and high glucose ratio","df$sample_group == 'Positive'","df$CSV.WBC.RBC.ratio < 0.037 & df$CSV.P.Glu.ratio > 0.6 & df$CSV.Protein < 0.5",cols = c("sample_group","CSV.WBC.RBC.ratio","CSV.P.Glu.ratio","CSV.Protein"))))))
   

```

# Figure 1 - Biomarkers

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.height = 1.5, fig.width = 7, fig.align = "center"}
   df <- df_samples[df_samples$sample_group == "Negative" | df_samples$sample_group == "Positive",]
   group <- "sample_group"

   fig_boxplot(df, var = "CSV.WBC.RBC.ratio", group, title = "A) CSF-WBC / CSF-RBC")

   fig_boxplot(df, var = "CSV.Protein", group, title = "B) CSF-Protein")
   
   fig_boxplot(df, var = "CSV.P.Glu.ratio", group, title = "C) CSF-Glu / P-Glu")
   
   fig_boxplot(df, var = "Blood.WBC", group, title = "D) B-WBC")
   
   fig_boxplot(df, var = "Blood.CRP", group, title = "E) P-CRP")
   


```
